description: Detects VBScript content stored into registry keys as seen being used by UNC2452 group
name: VBScript Payload Stored in Registry
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion* AND winlog.event_data.Details:(*vbscript\:* OR *jscript\:* OR *mshtml,* OR *RunHTMLApplication* OR *Execute\(* OR *CreateObject* OR *window.close*)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run*) OR (process.executable.text:*\\msiexec.exe AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Installer\\UserData\\* AND winlog.event_data.Details:(*\\Microsoft.NET\\Primary\ Interop\ Assemblies\\Microsoft.mshtml.dll* OR *<\\Microsoft.mshtml,fileVersion\=* OR *_mshtml_dll_* OR *<\\Microsoft.mshtml,culture\=*)))))
author: Florian Roth
